arts.ttl: "Superior to us in every aspect" – Ilzer in awe of Eintracht Frankfurt's after Hoffenheim's 1-3 loss
arts.sum: Hoffenheim coach Christian Ilzer felt Eintracht Frankfurt’s clinical finishing proved decisive in Saturday’s game at the PreZero Arena.

arts.ttl: Ritsu Dōan masterclass powers Eintracht Frankfurt to convincing win at Hoffenheim
arts.sum: A Man-of-the-Match display from Ritsu Dōan fired Eintracht Frankfurt to a 3-1 victory over Hoffenheim at the PreZero arena, making it two wins from two for the Eagles at the start of this campaign. Dōan strikes the ball with precision to open the scoring for Eintracht Frankfurt, curling a beautiful left-footed shot into the top corner from outside the box.

arts.ttl: TSG Hoffenheim vs. Eintracht Frankfurt preview: Both sides look to build on positive start
arts.sum: Both Hoffenheim and Eintracht Frankfurt are looking to build on their respective strong starts as they clash at the PreZero Arena on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs Frankfurt - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Hoffenheim and Eintracht Frankfurt, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
